input: How to file GSTR-3B for June 2025?
output:
To file GSTR-3B for June 2025 (due July 20, 2025):
1. Log in to gst.gov.in.
2. Navigate to Services > Returns > GSTR-3B.
3. Enter outward supplies (Table 3.1) from GSTR-1.
4. Input ITC details (Table 4) from GSTR-2B.
5. Calculate tax liability and offset with ITC/cash (Table 6).
6. Submit and pay via electronic cash/credit ledger.
7. File with DSC/EVC.
Note: From July 2025, Table 3 values are auto-locked from GSTR-1, so ensure GSTR-1 accuracy. InvoNest automates this.
